beer.beer_description:
Called a bright ale because of its brilliant clarity, Cascade Bright is made from 100% malt and uses a blend of three specially selected hops: Pride of Ringwood for bitterness and both Galaxy and Cascades for aroma.


Its golden hue is a result of the crystal malt added to the mash.  Cascade Bright Ale is easy-drinking, crisp and refreshing with a subtle balance of fruit and floral aromas which come from the hops.


Grilled Angus Cheeseburger, caramelised onions and lettuce & tomato.

As the subtle crystal malt notes complement the caramelised onion, the moderate bitterness balances the meat and cheese providing a cleansing effect.

items.checkin_comment:
Along with Yves at his home golden blond colored sparkling body with a white head and a floral fruity hop aroma a hop fruity sweet herby bitter taste with a bitter finis

RB  2015
